"A.P.241/4/24/13:00": "After Ardem withdrew, we lost contact with the Earth Guide headquarters in Las Vegas..."
"As for the other branches, they contacted ARKS with inquiries into what had happened."
"We can reasonably assume that the rest of Earth Guide did not know of Ardem's true intentions."
"Ardem's real intentions... Taking the power of a weakened Mother and..."
"He was talking about guiding our evolution, right? How does he plan to do such a thing?"
"All of Earth guide, ARKS, everyone... we were all being used as tools for that moment... Ardem..."
"To him, there's no conflict of consciousness in doing so. He believes what he is doing is always \"right\", after all."
"In fact, from his point of view, I'm sure he's not able to understand your reasoning. That's why he was trying to convince you."
"\"Mother is an evil demon who tried to manipulate the Earth. Why am I being criticized for killing it?\""
"\"I'll take Mother's power and use it for the Earth. Isn't this the best outcome for Earth, an act of absolute justice?\""
"\"Use it for the Earth\"... Does that mean he's going to do this evolution stuff using Mother's power?"
"Indeed. Ardem's goal is the evolution of the Earth. To return this world to the paradise it once was."
"Essentially, he means to use the power of Ether to recreate the world."
"I'm sure the absence of God in modern times, and the loss of that paradise, are unforgiveable to that man. After being banished from that paradise, he's very determined."
"Demon Phaleg... How do you know so much? What's your relationship to Ardem?"
"...He and I are adversaries from the first and longest conflict in human history."
"I wanted to kill him before it got to this point, but there were so many unexpected variables..."
"Kill him... You're planning to kill Ardem?"
"Indeed, you are correct, young lady. That's the only option."
"Unlike Mother, he doesn't believe his actions are ever wrong. He'll never stop."
"Do you understand, young lady? That you will actually have to kill him."
"You hesitated even against an enemy like me. Can you really kill a former friend like him?"
"...I'm not powerful or great enough to decide who lives and who dies."
"There's only one thing I can do right now. Act according to the desires in my heart."
"I won't lie about what I want to do. I decided that day... No matter who my opponent is, I won't budge."
"Even though he killed Mother? He cut her down so easily as she was reconciling. Don't you hate him?"
"I'm not mature enough to say I don't. I'm pissed off, and I hate him... but even then, I won't change."
"I'm going to stop Ardem. I'll listen to him, try to understand why he's doing it... and stop him."
"Because... That's what I want to do."
"...Young lady, may I have your name?"
"Hitsugi. Hitsugi Yasaka."
"Alright, Histugi. Let's end our discussion here."
"You and I are not allies. From here on out, this is a competition."
"I will try to kill Ardem. You will try to stop him. Let's both do our best."
"However, I do hope we all survive... and can one day battle each other at full strength."
"Alright, <%me>. If you don't mind, could you please escort me back to Earth?"
"I know ARKS isn't a group of rude individuals who would send back a visitor without an escort, right?"
